propertyDescriptor.name: SSRSServerURL
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the baseURL to the server used to load SSRS reports. It is expected to be something like: 'http://myServer.edu/Reports/Pages/ReportViewer.aspx?'

propertyDescriptor.name: SSRSReportFolder
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the subfolder within SSRS that holds the EHR reports

propertyDescriptor.name: BillingContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the path to the container holding billing data. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/ehr'
